keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

headline.print_headline: Many Need to Shop Around on HealthCare.gov as Prices Jump, U.S. Says
headline.main: Many Need to Shop Around on HealthCare.gov as Prices Jump, U.S. Says

byline.original: By ROBERT PEAR and ABBY GOODNOUGH

snippet: Federal officials said people would need to pick new plans under the Affordable Care Act to avoid substantial increases in health insurance premiums.
abstract: Rising health care premiums on HealthCare.gov are likely to force many consumers to shop around for new plans; officials insist buyers will still have access to choice of affordable plans.
lead_paragraph: Federal officials said people would need to pick new plans under the Affordable Care Act to avoid substantial increases in health insurance premiums.
